#DevTest

###Documentation

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/483c9ebb922e7f0d2221#?env%5BDevTest%)

###Before running

#####Install all the dependencies
`npm i`

#####Create .env file
`touch .env`
Variabels you need specify to .env:
* HOST
* PORT
* DB_URI
* SALT
* ACCESS_SECRET
* REFRESH_SECRET

### Running
* production mode: `npm start`
* development mode: `npm run dev`

### Testing
`npm test`
